name: Pysch-Escape
description:
Originally developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 - "Let there be Chaos"

Captured by an evil shadowy organization, use your chaotic psychic abilities to escape!

You have limited control over your four powers, use them well to navigate the complex and find your way out.

Controls :

  • WASD - Move
  • W - Jump
  • Left Click - use current psychic ability (must have Psych Mode on)
  • Right Click - Toggle Psych Mode
  • Q and E - Cycle through your psychic abilities.
